S

scoreIncrease() - Method in class basketball.Player
This method increases the score of the game if the player makes a shot and calls upon the helper method calculatePoints to calculate if the player gets 2 or 3 points.
setApexX(int) - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Testing purposes; initial x position of the apex
setApexY(int) - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Testing purposes; initial y position of the apex
setBeingShot(boolean) - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Can change the boolean value of the "beingShot" variable.
setDone(boolean) - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Testing purposes; changes the done boolean value.
setHasBall(boolean) - Method in class basketball.Player
This method sets the boolean hasBall.
setHoopX(int) - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Testing purposes; setting the x position of the hoop
setHoopY(int) - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Testing purposes; setting the y position of the hoop
setIn(boolean) - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Can change the boolean value of the "in" variable.
setInitX(int) - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Testing purposes; initial x position of the ball
setInitY(int) - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Testing purposes; initial y position of the ball
setIsShooting(int) - Method in class basketball.Player
This method is setter method for the field isShooting and sets which player is shooting the ball.
setScored(boolean) - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Can change the boolean value of the "scored" variable.
setStart(boolean) - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Testing purposes; changes the start boolean value.
setX(int) - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Replaces the x position with a new x position in real time.
setX(int) - Method in class basketball.Player
This is the setter method for the player's x coordinate
setY(int) - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Replaces the y position with a new y position in real time.
setY(int) - Method in class basketball.Player
This is the setter method for the player's y coordinate
shoot() - Method in class basketball.Player
This method is a helper method that helps the Ball class determine if the player possesses the ball or not based on the boolean hasBall
shootMotion() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Responsible for calculating the trajectory (equation) via which the ball will travel on the way to the hoop.
shotChance() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
The probability of whether the shot will be scored or not.
steal() - Method in class basketball.Player
This method calculates if the player on defense is close enough to the player on offensive and then allows for the player on defense to steal the ball with a 20% rate of success.
